metadata.name: Dom mefenamic Acid 250 mg Tablet coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of various cancers

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Used in the treatment of cancer it is an angiogenesis and metastasis inhibitor As an angiogenesis inhibitor it limits the growth and production of blood vessels As an antimetatstatic agent it prevents malignant cells from breaching the basement membranes
